Package games.stendhal.client.gui.styled

Class StyledOptionPaneUI

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
javax.swing.plaf.OptionPaneUI
javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicOptionPaneUI
games.stendhal.client.gui.styled.StyledOptionPaneUI
public class StyledOptionPaneUI extends BasicOptionPaneUI
OptionPaneUI that tries to clean a bit of the assumptions that everyone uses the metal theme.
